net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy
Class RandomConstrainedStrategy

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.AbstractStrategy
      net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.AbstractTradingStrategy
          net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.FixedQuantityStrategyImpl
              net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.FixedDirectionStrategy
                  net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.RandomConstrainedStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Parameterizable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, FixedQuantityStrategy, TradingStrategy, MarketEventListener
public class RandomConstrainedStrategy
extends FixedDirectionStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable

A trading strategy that in which we bid a different random markup on our agent's private value in each market round. This strategy is often referred to as Zero Intelligence Constrained (ZI-C) in the literature.

Parameters

base.maxmarkup
double >= 0		 (the maximum markup to bid for)

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
Serialized Form
